title: Imran Khan’s convoy fired upon during rally
dc:creator: Editor
description:
Imran Khan, the former Pakistani prime minister, has reportedly been injured in a shooting attack targeting his supporters as they marched on the capital Islamabad.

The post Imran Khan’s convoy fired upon during rally appeared first on NewsIn.Asia.
content:encoded:
Nov 3 (NewsWire) – Imran Khan, the former Pakistani prime minister, has reportedly been injured in a shooting attack targeting his supporters as they marched on the capital Islamabad.

Unidentified gunmen opened fire on the vehicle carrying Mr Khan as it passed through Wazirabad, Pakistan’s Dawn newspaper reported on Thursday.

At least four PTI leaders, including chairman Imran Khan, were injured after unidentified armed men opened fire.

The post Imran Khan’s convoy fired upon during rally appeared first on NewsIn.Asia.
